CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Code__c, "1"), IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif","Green",30,60), IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Code__c, "2"), IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif","Red",30,60), IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Code__c, "3"), IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif","Yellow",30,60), IF( ISPICKVAL(Status_Code__c, "4"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015a00000039PAD","Orange"), null))))
CustomField.label: Status
